data.title: Devon Cass LIVE singing Cher, Joan Rivers, Gaga.
data.meta_description: Contact Devon Cass LIVE singing Cher, Joan Rivers, Gaga.  from New York City on The Bash. Browse Cher Impersonator prices, photos, and 9 reviews, with a rating of 5 out of 5.
data.text: Devon Cass is so "UNBELIEVABLE" CHER herself thought Devon was her when shown pictures of him during a KTU radio interview in NYC. Take a listen to the interview by watching Devon's promo video as Cher. Devon Cass is the only EXACT sounding "LIVE SINGING AND SPEAKING" male Cher impersonator in the East Coast... Setting him apart from the rest this allows Devon to stay in character throughout the whole show and picture taking to give you 100% Cher at all times during your event!! Devon has been told he is THE NEXT BEST THING TO HAVING THE REAL CHER AT AN EVENT!!! IF YOU WOULD LIKE MORE THAN CHER AT YOUR EVENT READ THIS AMAZING OFFER BELOW! DEVON CAN DO UP TO TWO TO THREE CELEBS PER PARTY AND GIVES AN INCREDIBLE SAVINGS OF 50% OFF INITIAL FEE FOR EACH ADDITIONAL CHARACTER. EACH CHARACTER INCLUDES A 30 MINUTE SHOW AND THEM MINGLING AND TAKING PICTURES WITH GUEST FOR ADD 30. YOU GET TO PICK FROM THE 39 OTHER CELEBS THAT DEVON TRANSFORMS INTO. HE JUST NEEDS 30 MINS BETWEEN CHARACTERS TO CHANGE (Devon includes a professional sound system and small light show to assure the highest quality show completely free of charge!) You can select Lady Gaga, Elton John, Madonna, Liza, Celine Dion, Barbra, Bette Midler, Britney Spears, Andy Warhol, Rod Stewart, Neil Diamond, Katy Perry, John Travolta, Barry Gibb,and Dolly Parton. if you select Joan On the "Red Carpet" Devon welcomes your guest as Joan Rivers in "Fashion Police Style". When your guest find out Devon is all the celebs at your event they will be amazed and talk about your party for a long time! Devon Cass is a "LIVE" singing Cher, Elvis, Rod Stewart, Elton John, Neil Diamond, and Marilyn Monroe impersonator. The rest of the divas he lip-syncs perfectly to their tracks... If you desire a performer who has proven time and time again that he outshines all the other competition. A performer who has graced the television waves, more than any impersonator you would find. A performer who proves every time, that you have paid for the best... Devon Cass is the show you want. Whether it's Cher, Elvis, Lady Gaga, Joan Rivers, Liza Minnelli, Dolly Parton, Bette Midler, or any other of the Celebs he performs as, he embodies these characters to perfection and gives you high energy concert performances with warm and hysterical banter in between songs that will make your party unforgettable. He is the best there is... In his 30 to 60 minute shows Devon will entertain your guest with great energetic performances where they will be amazed thinking they are watching the actual DIVAS! Devon is great with audience participation by including party guest in his shows making them back up dancers for "Believe" as Cher,"Born This Way" as Gaga ,and "People" as Babs... As Marilyn, Devon dresses someone up as Jane Russell to perform with him in "Just Two Little Girls from Little Rock" as Cher he also selects a party guest to sing along as Sonny for "I Got You Babe" which is always a crowd pleaser. Devon loves to sing "Happy Birthday" live as Cher or Marilyn which is always a memorable moment for the celebrated birthday guest. Devon is EXTREMELY photogenic as Cher and all the celebrities he portrays lending itself to great pictures with your guest they can post on Facebook or just have for a special memento. He then will dance and mingle this adds to the fun creating a more fun and alive atmosphere at every party. Devon Cass's impersonation and make up talents have been showcased on "Entertainment Tonight","Kelly and Michael","Access Hollywood",and "Extra". He was also was on the cover of the millineum issue of "Rolling Stone" as Cher in Jan 2000, and declared a Makeup Genius! in "Glamour magazine" If you want top notch entertainment which outshines the rest in look and performance hire Devon Cass Master of Celebrity Impersonation. You and your guest will be mesmerized!!! If you have any questions or to see amazing videos of his energetic and uncanny performances, check out his website:
